channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Enjoy the Empire “Skate” Plaza with Outdoor Programs!
item.description: Date: Wednesday, February 5, 2025 9:30 AM - 2:00 PM - Visit the Mueller Center sign up and get more information for this event!
item.author: Students

item.title: Join the CCPD for Career Fair Info Sessions on February 11
item.description: From 5pm to 8pm on Tuesday, February 11, students are invited to attend 45-minute info sessions with select career fair employers in the Union before the fair! Please see the CCPD Spring 2025 Career Fair Info Sessions collection in Handshake for more info; please note that space is limited, and all sessions are on a first-come, first-served basis.
item.author: Students

item.title: Career Fair Prep with CCPD Peer Career Advisors to be Held February 4
item.description: Don’t miss this opportunity from 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM on Tuesday, February 4 to get insider advice from students who’ve been in your shoes and are now working at the CCPD to help you succeed. Register on Handshake and then bring your questions and get ready to walk into the career fair with confidence!
item.author: Students

item.title: ECSE Co-term MS and BS-PhD programs - Information Session
item.description: On Wednesday February 5 at 5 PM in the Mercer Clubhouse (JEC 6203), Prof. Rich Radke will hold an information session about the Co-term MS and BS-PhD programs. Course requirements, the application process, and deadlines will be discussed.
item.author: Students

item.title: Counseling Center Announces Walk-in Hours for Spring 2025
item.description: Rensselaer’s Counseling Center invites students to meet with a counselor without a formal appointment during designated walk-in hours! Two walk-in hours are available each day: from 10am to noon on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays, and from 2:00pm to 4:00pm Tuesdays and Thursdays. Walk-in counseling is also available on a first-come, first-served basis on days when classes are in session; students who cannot attend the walk-in times can call (518) 276-6479 to schedule an appointment.
item.author: Students

item.title: “Understanding the US Taxes System” Session Being Offered as Part of Spring Graduate Lunch and Learn Series
item.description: Date: Wednesday, February 5, 2025 12:00 PM - 2:30 PM - Please join Michael Jackstadt and Mark Moran for an insightful seminar on taxes, and how they work for students. Lunch will be served from 12-12:30; please note that seating is limited for this hybrid event.
item.author: Students

item.title: MSE Seminar Series Continues February 5
item.description: Date: Wednesday, February 5, 2025 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM - This seminar will feature a presentation titled “Memristive Devices: from Materials Science to Neuromorphic Hardware,” by Dr. Qiangfei Xia, of the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Massachusetts.
item.author: Community

item.title: ECSE Mercer Seminar Slated for February 5
item.description: Date: Wednesday, February 5, 2025 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM - Attend this ECSE Mercer Seminar titled “Security: The Next Grand Challenge for Hardware Design (and what to do about it),” with Kanad Basu, Assistant Professor, University of Texas at Dallas.
item.author: Community

item.title: Human Resources Schedules “4 Steps to Effective Communication: Extended DISC” Professional Development Workshop
item.description:
Date: Thursday, February 6, 2025 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM - Our success, both personally and professionally, is largely determined by our ability to communicate effectively with a variety of people. In this workshop, participants will receive individualized Extended DISC reports (based on the completion of the Extended DISC questionnaire) that reflect both their “natural” and “adjusted” behavioral styles and learn strategies which promote successful interactions with others.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
